title: 全部金粒求回复关于PEX权限插件
author: thy1048748911
txt_content:
[PermissionsEx] Error occurred with PermissionsEx! Please post it to http://git.io/v0q27. Full error:
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: No such field permSubs in class class us.Myles.PWP.FakePluginManager
        at ru.tehkode.utils.FieldReplacer.<init>(FieldReplacer.java:16)
        at ru.tehkode.permissions.bukkit.regexperms.PEXPermissionSubscriptionMap.inject(PEXPermissionSubscriptionMap.java:48)
        at ru.tehkode.permissions.bukkit.regexperms.RegexPermissions.<init>(RegexPermissions.java:29)
        at ru.tehkode.permissions.bukkit.PermissionsEx.onEnable(PermissionsEx.java:192)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:316)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:332)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:417)
        at us.Myles.PWP.FakePluginManager.enablePlugin(FakePluginManager.java:199)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:476)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:394)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.n(MinecraftServer.java:360)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.g(MinecraftServer.java:334)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:290)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:210)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:458)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:628)
[02:23:18] [Server thread/INFO]: WEPIF: PermissionsEx detected! Using PermissionsEx for permissions.
[02:23:18] [Server thread/INFO]: Essentials: Using PermissionsEx based permissions.
[02:23:18] [Server thread/INFO]: WEPIF: Using the Bukkit Permissions API.
[02:23:18] [Server thread/INFO]: [Vault][Permission] PermissionsEx hooked.
[02:23:18] [Server thread/INFO]: Essentials: Using config file enhanced permissions.
[02:23:18] [Server thread/INFO]: Permissions listed in as player-commands will be given to all users.看下这是什么错误 不要告诉我 重新下载 我只想说 版本没错 核心1.7.2  都没有错

replies.author: a1154662510
replies.txt_content: 这是干了什么才刷的报错

replies.author: thy1048748911
replies.txt_content: 还有告诉各位的是    插件 加多了 PEX插件就加载不了  然后删除一个插件 控制台输入/PEX 又可以弹出指令，或者PEX能加载 另一个插件又不能加载

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content:
thy1048748911 发表于 2015-12-31 22:34
还有告诉各位的是    插件 加多了 PEX插件就加载不了  然后删除一个插件 控制台输入/PEX 又可以弹出指令， ...
明显的插件冲突问题....
